item.description:
Bring your gifts to the world with Profit and Purpose
 Monday, June 20, 7-9 pm   Free    Bring friends!
 with Kathleen Hanagan, Mentor to the Soul of Business

 Attention heart-centered entrepreneurs, healers, therapists, coaches and people who want to make a difference in the world!  Do you have a deep yearning to offer something of value to the world and make good money at it?  If you are ready to step up and take your dream of a business or your present business to a new level of contribution and profit, come to this 2-hour interactive presentation by Kathleen Hanagan.  It promises to have you open your eyes to the possibilities that await you when you connect deeply wit your Gifts in a a spirit of Abundance.  See more info about Kathleen at  www.KathleenHanagan.com.

   For other programs at A Higher Balance to go www.AHigherBalance.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to suite 6B
item.name: Heart-Centeered entrepreneurs, bring your gifts to the world with profit!
